title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 260.7 - Maximum amount of credits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 260.7 - Maximum amount of credits

State Regulations

Maximum amount of credits.The aggregate amount of tax credits
allowed under section
43
of the Tax Law to taxpayers subject to tax
under articles 9-A and 22 of the Tax Law in any taxable year shall be
$10,000,000, and shall be allotted from the funds available for tax credits
under article 17 of the Economic Development Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
260.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
